opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Superior Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice McCAFFERY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Tina M. Fryling, Joseph Paul Burt, Erie, for K.A.P., Jr.

Matthew James McLaughlin, Erie, for County of Erie.
